channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @N_S_Dolkart If only we had an Amendment granting us the ability to fight back against unelected tyrants….
Looks like the new @storybundle collection features an anthology of trans SF edited by @benyehudapress social media maven @bogiperson. https://t.co/168hTPpyC7
I hope my friends have found new ways to watch Israeli television: Every ISP in the US has been ordered to block three Israeli pirate streaming services | Ars Technica https://t.co/hchkJfb5iO
@mikeblu201 Same reason they believe cops and corporate overlords are the good guys.
@AvBronstein Time drags so much slower once tachanun returns.
As I’ve told my kids, your source code may be open sourced some day, so code like you are dancing alone, but comment like the whole world is watching. https://t.co/zjxlyGiuSm https://t.co/uIHwuYNSt3
@jh_swanson @Shmarya As they, quite falsely, claim God had in mind when He founded this country.
@bogiperson הכל מותר לך!
@kalishjon @eddyportnoy @yivoinstitute @jdforward Damn. You scooped me on Webberman!
How it started. H/t @atrios https://t.co/yNord9Unn9
@DBashIdeas Bodes well for sales of my Yiddish titles! https://t.co/Av60KL2DrR
@joshtpm Luckily, his team is practiced in the arts of deception.

Retweeting to give Dr. Dainy a second chance to win, but my Jewish media peeps might want to look at the chapter on Jewish Tik Tok. https://t.co/pCUkRPOB11
Here’s the relevant excerpt from the table of contents. https://t.co/tkeZa6lmQt
Of whom one I could find #onhere. @TomDivon looks like a very interesting follow.

@JustInCaseKate @conrad_truedson @JamesFallows @IChotiner I'll defer to your judgement. But the question of why someone would think that Lindsay Graham was a good-faith actor in 2017 is worth investigating. Katyal is not generally stupid. So why was his judgement on this matter so flawed?
@JustInCaseKate @conrad_truedson @JamesFallows @IChotiner Himself. Sorry.
@JustInCaseKate @conrad_truedson @JamesFallows @IChotiner Or… a grifter yourself. I don’t know enough about Katyal to speculate but it’s certainly a possibility.
The right of Christian clergy to massacre Jews is deeply rooted in history. https://t.co/Zo8vysQyW7
President refused to be caught up in the Sunni-Shiite War. Good for him! https://t.co/rvTpRoI4SQ
@MattFriedmanNJ Anyway, aren’t we supposed to be paying premium prices for the legal stuff to ensure a modicum of purity?
Your occasional reminder that Jersey offers better vistas than does Pennsylvania. https://t.co/y1Eik4F7sq
@MattFriedmanNJ Didn’t see it either. I think such figures, if true, would be deeply dispiriting for Big Chlorophyll.

@brettglass @davewiner The other secret of Twitter is to have a list that is your Karass. I follow a couple thousand people -- all generally interesting. I have fewer than a hundred on my list, all people who I want to stay connected with it and whose ideas I don't want to miss.
@brettglass @davewiner Some are peers; some are people who swim in bigger ponds. And always, always, chronological.
@ReallyAmerican1 And vice versa. Fanatics propped up by shady interests.

@kampeas @rmneiss I’m seeing them now. It might be a delay in accessing jpgs — another account I follow is complaining her screen caps are going missing right now.
@kampeas @rmneiss I wouldn’t be surprised if today was a particularly high usage day here in twitterland.
